About.Officer in charge: Manager of Reference and Information Services

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 10am-8pm and Sat 10am-4pm; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, microfilms, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans.

About.Acquisition focus: Local history of Woollahra Municipality, municipal records, aldermanic papers.

About.Major holdings: Woollahra Municipal Council: Minutes, municipal records 1860-1970 (70m); Rate books 1860-1950 (30m). Vaucluse Municipal Council: Municipal records 1893-1948 (40m); Rate books 1893-1948 (25m). Paddington Municipal Council: Municipal records 1860-1948 (40m); Minutes 1860-1948 (25m).

Contact.Street address: 548 New South Head Road, Double Bay 2028
